VOICE_REPEAT.TITLE: Voice Repeat Game
VOICE_REPEAT.DESCRIPTION: Listen to the word and repeat it correctly!
VOICE_REPEAT.READY: Ready to test. Press the button to speak.
VOICE_REPEAT.ERROR_NO_SPEECH: No speech detected. Check your microphone and try again.
VOICE_REPEAT.ERROR_NOT_ALLOWED: Microphone permission denied. Check your browser settings.
VOICE_REPEAT.NOT_SUPPORTED: Microphone feature not supported in this browser. Use Chrome or Edge.
